sentences.en: Furry and feathery animals are a common trigger of asthma symptoms.
sentences.cn: 动物的毛发(包括羽毛)是一种常见的哮喘过敏原.

sentences.en: It is snowing with feathery snowflakes.
sentences.cn: 天下起了羽毛般的雪片.

sentences.en: Spanish grass with light feathery panicles grown for dried bouquets.
sentences.cn: 西班牙一种草本植物,轻薄的羽毛状圆锥花序,用作干花.

sentences.en: Sweet, figure - flattering two - piece in feathery pink with dainty forget - me - not print all over.
sentences.cn: 甜, 图 - 恭维两件粉红色的羽毛与讲究勿忘我,而不是打印所有.

sentences.en: Sybil Dennant, seated on the sofa a feathery laugh, shot a barking terrier dog at Shelton.
sentences.cn: 坐在沙发上的西比尔·丹南特, 轻轻地笑了一声,纵容一只正在狺狺的小猎狗箭也似地向谢尔顿那儿窜过去.

sentences.en: The bright green, feathery leaves turn reddish brown in autumn.
sentences.cn: 叶亮绿色, 羽状,秋季变成红棕色.

sentences.en: The foliage was soft and feathery.
sentences.cn: 叶子如羽毛般轻软柔和。

sentences.en: The fountain of youth can be feathery bangs that skim your eyebrows.
sentences.cn: 年轻的源泉就在于掠过眉毛的轻柔刘海.
这种植物长着羽状叶片。

sentences.en: There was a heap of old feathery wood - ashes on the hearth.
sentences.cn: 壁炉上有—堆轻轻的陈年的柴灰.

words.tran_cn: 有羽毛的；羽状的；飞速的；薄边的
轻吹；羽毛被覆状；羽毛状
羽毛；羽状物；轻快的弓法

trans.tran_cn: 生有羽毛的，柔软如羽毛的，软绵绵
trans.tran_en: looking or feeling light and soft, like a feather
